description: After being expelled from Barbieland for not being a perfect-looking doll, Barbie sets off to the human world to find true happiness.
function: From Monday to Sunday at 4:00 PM, 7:00 PM, 10:00 PM.
title: Barbie

description: Physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer works with a team of scientists during the Manhattan Project, which led to the development of the atomic bomb.
function: From Monday to Sunday at 4:00 PM, 7:00 PM, 10:00 PM.
title: Oppenheimer

description: During the 1990s, the Maximals, Predacons, and Terrorcons join the existing battle on Earth between Autobots and Decepticons
function: From Monday to Sunday at 4:00 PM, 7:00 PM, 10:00 PM.
title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts

description: After meeting Gwen Stacy, Spider-Man from Brooklyn is thrown across the multiverse and encounters a team of Spider-People tasked with protecting their existence
function: From Monday to Sunday at 4:00 PM, 7:00 PM, 10:00 PM.
title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse

description: Although still affected by the loss of Gamora, he must gather his team to defend the universe from a new threat. In case of failure, it will be the end of the Guardians.
function: From Monday to Sunday at 4:00 PM, 7:00 PM, 10:00 PM.
title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
